text: Tweety (or Tweety Bird) is a fictional character from Looney Tunes. He is a yellow canary. He has also appeared in comic books. He was voiced by Mel Blanc. He is mainly known for saying “I tought I taw a puddy tat”, which is a babyish way of saying that he saw a cat. This cat is usually Sylvester, who tries to eat Tweety. == References == Category:Animated characters Category:Anthromophic characters Category:Fictional birds Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1942 Category:Looney Tunes characters
title: Tweety
